name: Mimpi
description: Explore strange new worlds and enjoy unique adventures in Mimpi! Mimpi is fantastic new adventure, puzzle, and platformer game.  The game is like a psychedelic illustration come alive.  Mimpi the dog is searching for his master in eight diverse worlds. The environment is seldom repetitive, the puzzles are always new.

reviews.review_text: This game has good art, music, and an interesting concept, but is pure torture to play. The controls are unresponsive and imprecise. Mostly that doesn't matter. It does matter in the two underwater levels. Everybody hates underwater levels so let's make two. Some of the puzzles require perfectly timed precision jumps, these will take dozens of frustrating attempts to get through. The puzzles can best be described as everyone's least favorite puzzles from any puzzle game you have played. The hint system is sometimes useful and sometimes not. You have to play Tetris to get your hint. When I didn't want to play Tetris I'd watch walkthroughs. All the walkthroughs I could find were people playing the game for the first time. So, apparently, nobody plays this twice.

This game is short, but it's very artistic and beautiful! It can be very hard and frustrating at times (which is good) and it's very easy to die. There's only two cutscenes (at the beginning and the end) but that doesn't change anything. It's a simple, yet fun game. I love it! :>
